divs: sighting detailsmy son and i were driving home after running some errands when my son said, "hey, look dad, one of those things like i saw a couple of years ago". (he has seen these before!) i looked over to my left and spotted a long bright silver object "hovering"\sitting motionless in the sky. we kept our eye(s) on it, and as we pulled over to the curb to get a better look, it disappeared. we both said at the same time, "where did it go?!" my son has seen these same type ufos on 3 occasions, but on 2 of the occasions the ufo was manuevering; when we saw it together july 5th, it was "hovering". very bizarre and very frustrating to not be able to bet a better, longer look at it. we can't even estimate the distance or the altitude, since we have no frame of reference. there has been, and there is a lot of ongoing construction, commercial and residential, with a stretch of freeway just completed in roughly the area where we saw the ufo hovering. maybe they are wondering why all the activity?
Summary: "Cigar" shaped bright silver object spotted hovering over Chandler, AZ
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Chandler
There were no other sightings in Chandler on or around July 5th 2004
